definition: a burner that mixes air and gas to produce a very hot flame, burn maliciously, as by arson
details:
noun
- a burner that mixes air and gas to produce a very hot flame
= synonyms: blowtorch
- a small portable battery-powered electric lamp
= synonyms: flashlight
- a light usually carried in the hand
- tall-stalked very woolly mullein with densely packed yellow flowers
= example: tall-stalked very woolly mullein with densely packed yellow flowers
= synonyms: common mullein, great mullein, flannel mullein, woolly mullein
verb
- burn maliciously, as by arson
= example: burn maliciously, as by arson
